reviews.review: I was very underwhelmed by this game. Unlike Bioshock and Bioshock 2, this game is EXTREMELY railroad-y... you're basically just watching a really long movie and pushing some buttons here and there along the way. Not very fun if you like to actually PLAY a game or have an impact on how things unfold. Feels like they were trying waaay too hard to simulate a quirky old-fashioned environment too. It just felt downright silly at many moments. Overall I was disappointed.
Recomiendo este juego

처음 플레이 할떄는 가장낮은 난이도로 10시간 해서 엔딩을 봤는데 

2017/5/14 에 어려움난이도 도전해서 스팀플레이타임으로는 2~3시간도 안걸렸군요 .
또 오랜만에 해서 그런가 플레이 할떄마다 어지럼증을 느끼게 되네요 . -라이브러리 제거 (봉인)

[h1] 反乌托邦和平行世界大类的业界标杆[/h1]

[h1] 9.5/10 [/h1]
  十分有深度的游戏，游戏中伊丽莎白的设计简直就是后辈跟随式npc的标杆。你永远不怕你的伙伴挡你枪线，强行圣母/脑残，她还不会被打死，甚至嫌你打的慢给你补给。这些点让游戏性十分的顺滑 [spoiler] 战神和托他后退的老父亲 [strike]  当然自古战神弱dlc  [/strike] [/spoiler] 
[b] 
[u] 考虑到游戏难度只能带2把武器是游戏性上的硬伤之一，能腾空变出来堡垒却不能从平行世界切枪使得打某些场景就是单纯的打枪捡子弹，不够爽快。 [/u]  [/b] 
故事的叙述堪称平行世界类作品的典范， 小剧透警告[spoiler]能把我杀我自己讲的这么清晰和我女儿杀绝我自己讲的这么温馨的还是头一个  [/spoiler] 。
游戏中对主角的刻画也很深刻，将一个对战争和孩子的愧疚和救赎的老父亲形象塑造的很到位，伊丽莎白的青春活泼和困在牢笼里渴望自由的形象也十分到位，后来的哭戏配音十分惊艳。 [strike]制作组甚至让声优在自己家人去世时给伊丽莎白配的这段 [/strike]。
反派的塑造也很可以，将一个为了理想变得歇斯底里甚至将自己和唯一的亲人推向战争的神棍形象做的很到位。剧透警告 
[spoiler]在最后推翻了乌托邦然后反咬一口的起义军的衬托也使得反派十分立体，反派也不只是非黑即白，圣人也救不了哥伦比亚。[/spoiler]

20世纪蒸汽朋克风的乌托邦也是一大亮点，一个进步先进，蒸汽与魔法交织的世外桃源实则种族歧视与压迫并存形成了强烈反差，游戏一反逃离反乌托邦的常态而是将玩家作为一个帮助反抗压迫的中间人去见证这个空中楼阁的陨落，有一点自己把美好的事物撕碎的悲剧色彩。

[h1] 总结：第九艺术的代表，不世出的佳作 [/h1]
추천 받아서 구매했는데 좀 어지러움. 스토리는 흥미로운데 FPS장르가 익숙하지 않아서 어려움...

Beautiful artstyle, fast paced combat with a nice variety of special powers (vigors), along with one of the greatest voice acted and story driven games i've ever played.


A MUST BUY. 

10/10

Jogo incrível, história impressionante, a Elizabeth te transmite emoção, tanto na fala quanto nas expressões, enredo absurdamente bem escrito e com um pouco de mecânica quântica para os aficionados em Física.

Size şuana kadar oynamış olduğum en iyi oyunu öveceğim bioshock bir seri olarak değil ama son oyun namı değer Bioshock Infinite bir sanat eseri adeta bir şaheser film izlemeyi seviyorsanız senaryosu efsane her bir bulduğunuz ses kayıtlarından tutun klasik müzikli mekanları sizi 1900 lü yıllara götüren teması herşeyi tamamen kusursuz eğer bir oyuncuysanız ve hala bu oyunu oynamadıysanız siz daha bir şey görmemişsiniz demektir Bioshock 1 ve 2 benzer hikayesinden çok gameplay odaklı olsada son oyun çok oturaklı hem gameplay hem story grafikler zaten efsane müzikler keza ne diyeceğimi bilemiyorum şuan bitti diye üzülüyorum hatta neyse daha fazla uzamadan laflarım 12 saatimi aralıksız harcadığım bu oyun her saniyesine değer ben çok etrafı araştırarak oynadığım için bu kadar sürdü ki gene toplanması gereken şeylerin hepsini toplayamadım uzun lafın kısası bu oyunu alın oynayın oynattırın pişman olmicaksınız asla hatta açıp gene bitirebilirsiniz burdan içimde bir Bioshock bir Elizabeth aşkı doğmuş olabilir ama yorumlarımı nesnel olarak yaptım tabi azcık abartı olabilir alıpta pişman olursanız geri bana dönün neden sevmediğinizi çok merak ediyorum sevilmicek bir yanı yok neyse herkese iyi oyunlar !

今天刚打通关（10小时），顺便把评测写了。游戏画面很不错，刚到哥伦比亚时候感觉这里就像是天堂一样 ，随着剧情推动一些怪物NPC的出现使得之前的好景色变得阴暗，画风还是很不错的，给8分。
再说说内容，可以说整个无限都是由这线性的剧情撑起来的，没有额外的部分，在打怪方面也很单一就是 凸凸凸，顺便吐槽一下 为什么主角只能带两把枪，在特殊能力方面我觉得没什么突出的地方，给5分。
再看人设，相信大家玩过之后对 伊丽莎白是印象最为深刻的 不仅是个好队友（送血、送蓝、还送子弹和金币）最主要的是漂亮啊！这个给满分！
玩的时候在想 结局肯定是男主和伊丽莎白幸福的在一起了，结果大反转 伊丽莎白竟然是主角的女儿，不得不说整个游戏剧情的精华都在后面女主带男主寻找一切的真相那块。与所有平行时空内游戏或者小说一样，只有杀死源头的自己才能终结一切。
再多的就不剧透了，如果闲的没事可以去玩玩这个游戏，感受伊丽莎白的爱 的同时，仔细回味一下游戏结局带来的耐人寻味把。

我目前为止人生中，带给我最大感触，震撼的游戏剧情，作为一个从dos玩到ps4的玩家感觉这个评价一点也不为过。
时隔这么久，依然爱
Gud game 10/10

This game got amazing reviews, but I personally just found it incredibly boring. Without the horror aspects of the previous titles, the game tries to be more light hearted and just give you a fun world, but the combat mechanics are just lacking compare to other shooters. It all feels clunky, and you often find yourself exploiting AI whether you are trying to or not. This was all forgivable in previous Bioshock's to me, because I loved the world and I was playing the game for the atmosphere.

But this world just doesn't appeal to me. I've played tons of games where the majority of the game happens in the sky or floating islands or whatever, and most other games have better worlds. A good example is Baten Kaitos. Baten Kaitos IMO just has a much more interesting world than the one created here.

What an amazing game! If you dont think that shooters can have a good story this game definitely proofs you wrong. Also the soundtrack, gameplay and graphics are excellent. I coundt find one bad thing about this masterpiece that you have to play. Even the DLCs are amazing and no cash-making as in other games. 10/10

Beautiful visuals, music/sound and lore. Unfortunately as the game progresses, the dodgy level design and repetitive combat become tedious. I found myself just forcing myself through the game to save Elizabeth; they did that part right. I felt completely emotionally invested, which brings me to the reason I gave this game a negative review: the ending is the worst I've seen in recent memory. Whoever wrote it, fuck you.

O jogo é muito bom, e se você está com dúvidas ou preconceito do tipo: "RPG em primeira pessoa errrrrghhhhh", desencana que você não vai se arrepender!
Eu particularmente acho que gráficos cartunizados são eternos, pois bem, Bioshock Infinitive tem belos gráficos, uma ótima história com um final que faz você ficar pensativo, o que te rende muitas horas de jogo e dependendo da sua curiosidade algumas horas a mais de pós-jogo (eu fui um deles).

Ao meu ver (como nada é perfeito) o jogo peca em:
1 - Linearidade da história
Justificativa: Poderiam ter inserido uma liberdade de escolhas durante a campanha.
2 - Quantidade desnecessária de armas 
Justificativa:  Eu prefiro menos armas com mais engenhosidade empregada nelas como em Bioshock 1.
3 – Os poderes (vigores) sem utilidade além de combate.
Justificativa: Em Bioshock 1, os plasmids que são equivalentes aos vigores tinham finalidades durante o gameplay e não serviam apenas como arma.

O jogo possui um dos personagens mais cativantes e criativos dos games, me refiro a Elizabeth no qual é praticamente impossível você não se apegar a ela durante a jogatina!

De 0 a 10 eu daria um 8.

Obs: Eu citei Bioshock 1 várias vezes na análise porque ele é um jogo fenomenal, inclusive ele faz parte da “Lista de jogos considerados os melhores de todos os tempos”, então caso você tenha a oportunidade de jogar “Bishock 1 Remastered” (com gráficos e texturas melhoradas) jogue!

Confira: https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lista_de_jogos_considerados_os_melhores_de_todos_os_tempos

I've beaten this game twice. First time on medium and second on 1999 mode (hardest difficulty). I've also beaten the two previous bioshocks and love those two to death. But I can honestly say this is not only the best of the three but probably one of the best games of all time. I bought it on sale but if I could go back and buy it full price I would because it's really that fucking good. If you're bored and have extra cash buy this game I promis you won't regret it because it is superb.
Игра с самым сумашедшим сюжетом что мне довелось увидеть, всем советую (+ дополнения) От них просто крышу сносит.

[b]"I am not afraid of God but I'm afraid of you"[/b]
One of the greatest lines in any video game i can remember (and i started playing games on VIC20's); it is the capstone of this Masterpiece.

I am writing this review after my second play-through of the game. 

My first run was soon after release. i played it as a 'FPS  with a better then expected story' and like most was sent through an emotional and intellectual roller-coaster by the game's Conclusion.
This time i just played it though for the story; i wanted to re-experience it, see if it was as good as i remembered and see if  it still held its strength.
If anything it was even better this time. Without being distracted by the shooter side of it and knowing the conclusion enough to see how all the pieces fit together right from the beginning was a far greater journey that the first time.

Elizabeth's character is the perfect foil for Booker with her late-game transition being shocking.
The Lutice's are flawless 'pattern breakers' (in the psychological sense) to keep you gently off balance and questioning all the way through.

It would not be exagerating to say BioShock Infinite is one of the all-time greats and a must-play.
Jeu prenant avec un des rare dlc vraiment chouette
Strong beginning, strong ending, but the FPS parts during the middle of the game are repetitive and not that interesting.
loved the game and all of its levels and wtf ending

[h1]Всегда есть маяк. Всегда есть человек, всегда есть город...	[/h1]
Честно говоря, я не большой любитель игр в жанре Экшн/Шутрер. Но только не в этом случае. Для меня [b]Bioshok Infinite	[/b] - это и не игра. Это живое, захватывающее дух и пронизывающее до глубины души приключение, которое погружает игрока в красочную, атмосферную Колумбию. В ней идеально всё: декорации, музыка, диалоги... И конечно же Элизабет, которая несомненно является самым интересным и самым важным персонажем в игре, и делает игру такой атмосферной. В общем, это поистине гениальный шедевр игровой индустрии, лишающий покоя игрока не только на время прохождения, но и дающий пищу для размышлений после него. Однозначно рекомендую.
Лучшее!!!

Love & Respect 2K 

Well done

I hate to say this, but when I first time played Bioshock Infinite, I liked it. Nowadays when I have grown up, when you start to think about the plot and other details, you can actually notice contradictions and plotholes. I will not going into detail with them because it takes too long and some people have managed to make over 30 min videos explaining them. You can find them on Youtube.
This is yet again one of those games that make me wish Steam had neutral yellow option for mixed/neutral reviews

But, does the game hold up with other aspects....let's see

[h1] Bioshock Infinite [/h1]

Now, I personally think that Bioshock Infinite is one of the most overated games I ever played, if you compare it to the original Bioshock. I'll list some things

[b] Bioshock (2007) [/b]
*All weapons are at your use when obtained
*Different ammo types against different enemies and weapon upgrades
*Hacking minigame and crafting
*Manual saves, quick saves and autosaves
*Research camera to earn buffs
*First aid kits and EVE restorative items
*Different plasmids with different outcomes
*Gene tonics that give passive buffs (very good for different playstyles)
*Some levels offered you a chance to plan ahead (set up traps, hack turrets and so on...)
*The ability to go back to previous levels incase you missed something (gene tonics and other stuff could be found)
*Despite it wasn't advanced, you could still sneak around and surprise your enemy

[b] Bioshock Infinite (2013) [/b]
*Your carrying ability is limited to two weapons
*You can upgrade your weapons with money but theres only one ammo type for each weapon
*No crafting of any sort and hacking is replace with vigor that does every automaticly ( also less damage to possessed units for some reason)
*Autosave and no ability to save manually
*No ways to gain buffs except for vigors and weapons
*You cannot carry first aid kits or salt and you are forced to run around and constantly press F to find stuff when you are in a bad situation. (Fun???)
*Plasmids are replaced with vigors, but you most likely are gonna stick to two because upgrades are expensive
*Gene tonics ---> gone...now replaced with "gear" that offers some passive effects. (Not bad, but not great)
*You are given less options to plan ahead, because most levels are linear
*Less backtracking and not much reason to do that except for optional "quests"
*What stealth?

My review might be biased, but just think about these when comparing two games. I know that things change when making a sequel, but if you change the foundation radically, you need to replace them with good alternatives while staying faithful to the original. The alternatives in Bioshock Infinite are not well designed or atleast are too "casualized" for the lack of better term. Some may like it that way, but are they honestly better?

PROS (GREAT):
+ Art style is incredible
+ There are some great ideas in the game
+ Music fits perfectly with the timeline and is just as fun to listen as 50's songs.
+ The opening is actually amazing and feels like "Bioshock"
+ Runs well

PROS (ALRIGHT):
+ Gunplay is decent for the most part and animations are beautiful
+ Voice acting is good with the material they were given
+ Skylines adds some originality to the normal shooting while they are a bit silly

NEUTRAL/MIXED
* Vigors are somewhat fun to use, but are a bit of downgrade compared to Bioshock and it feels annoying that it all comes down to the money and Vigor upgrades are expensive, so most likely you are just using two of them. Having no salt bottles in your invetory doesn't help too.
* Elizabeth as a companion is alright I suppose, but there is no tension in fights because she cannot die and enemies ignore her and always shoot you
*Lack of minigames. It would've been fun to actually lockpick, but it's reduced to press F to make Elizabeth open it. Making things too simplified can you you impression that devs think players are too dumb to do things themselves

CONS (BAD):
- Melee usually clunky, which sometimes lead to strange misses.
- The main villain is weak and is not given reasonable explanation why he is what he is (if he has, please comment) other than being a racist. He just hates other races. oh, ok.....
- I know the reason why choices won't matter, but if there wasn't any contradictions and choice prompts, It would've be OK. Don't add "moral choices" if they don't affect the game in a meaningful way. [spoiler] The first game had much better excuse and it didn't even add moral choices other than little sisters, which actually makes sense [/spoiler]
- Why does this game have two weapon limit? What was the problem with the original system? Why not just improve the existing one? Could've made Bioshock Infinite it's own thing instead of copying elements from other FPS games.
-Booker and Elizabeth make idiotic decisions considering the circumstances

CONS (AWFUL)
- I don't see any valid reason to not have manual save in Bioshock Infinite. What makes it awful is the fact that you lose money and enemies are given health back with you having less stuff. First Bioshock had manual saves....so....why.....
- You cannot carry health packs/stims or salt just to make Elizabeth to do something. It's not fun to click everything to find food/drink items just because you are unable to carry health items. 
- The plot is full of holes and other stupid things. This wouldn't be a problem if the game wouldn't take itself so GODD**N seriously. If the game has deep plot, I'm going to think about it and the results are that most things in Bioshock Infinite don't make any sense.
- [spoiler] I'm just have come to the conclusion that having time travel and multiverses in your games/movies make it a mess, with a few exceptions [/spoiler]
- F**K handymans and [spoiler] ghosts...seriously [/spoiler]

I'm simply don't understand why this game got so much praise and even GOTY awards, considering that they changed so many things that made Bioshock amazing. For me this is 6/10 at best. H**L, I think even Bioshock 2 is better than this game. Even with some positives, this game comes off as boring and I was waiting for it to end. 
If you haven't played the previous Bioshocks, I guess this game could be for you, but I wouldn't recommend it if you loved the original Bioshock and 2.

If you think Bioshock Infinite has made good changes, please let me know in the comments below. I could explain further why I didn't like the plot.

Der einzige Bioshock-Teil den ich gespielt habe. Großes Kino! Lasst das nächste mal den Shooter weg und macht einen Kurzfilm draus.
游戏是不错，里面包含了很多剧情向FPS的要素，画面也不错，就是剧情太坑，脑洞太大，又是宗教又是量子力学的东西，穿越剧中很多地方都没讲的太明白，光让玩家猜很不讨好。本来给出了推荐，后来想想还是不推荐吧

Leider hat Bioshock Infinite im Vergleich zu seinen beiden Vorgängern sehr viel an Spieltiefe verloren. 

Dafür ist die Story einzigartig, Die Charaktere sind genial geschrieben, das Art-Design und Level-Design sind unübertroffen, Das Spiel macht sehr viel richtig.

Leider versagt es in der wichtigsten Disziplin: Dem Gameplay

Es wurde komplett Casualisiert, keine Map, kein Quicksafe, kein Storage für Salz (Eve-Spritzen) und Health (Verbandskästen). Das Haushalten mit Adam das Bioshock 1&2 einen gewissen RPG-Charme verliehen hat fehlt komplett. 
Grundsätzlich wurde das komplette Bioshock-Gameplay auf das Mindeste herunter gebrochen.
Infinite Spielt sich wie jeder andere 0815-Arcade-Shooter. Die "Magie" die Bioshock versprühte ist nicht mehr vorhanden.
Das Gunplay ist schlecht, die Waffen haben so gut wie kein Trefferfeedback (das ändert auch die Damage-Zahl die bei Treffern aus dem Gegner heraus "ploppt" nicht). 

Erinnert ihr euch an den Revolver, oder dem Chemowerfer aus BS1, oder an die Harpune und die Nietenpistole aus BS2? 
Dieses Gefühl, das ihr habt wenn ihr mit einer auf max. aufgelevelten Nietenpistole, einen Alpha-Serie-Daddy oder einen Brute-Splicer, mit einem gezielten Headshot fast bewegungsunfähig macht und er in Feuer aufgeht, werdet ihr bei Infinite vermissen.

Würde das Spiel nicht Bioshock im Namen tragen, hätte ich nichts auszusetzen. 
Aber Infinite hat NICHTS mehr mit Bioshock zu tun. 

Für mich kombinierte Bioshock ein herausragendes Gameplay mit genialer Story.

Das ist hier leider NICHT der Fall. 

Trotzdem ist es ein gutes Spiel, daher eine Kaufempfehlung von mir. Vorausgesetzt ihr könnt mit den Änderungen leben.
Mein erster Bioshock Teil und dann gleich so ein gutes Spiel. Gute Grafik und Mindfuck-Story.

Мне действительно имеет смысл расписывать почему игра хороша? Серьёзно?
Геймплей, сюжет, звук (особенно одна опциональная напевка), стиль... Аааагх,  серьёзно, мне несчастному юзеру в 2к17 не имеет смысла расписывать почему игра хороша и до сих пор держится.
Ну ладно, перестрелки слабоваты... И лицевая анимация подкачала. 
Так, мне не нравится куда это идёт, так что...

My first Bioshock game and my introduction to this great series. Haven't played a game with this good a story in a long time. And the fast-paced gameplay keeps things interesting. I recommend it, if for nothing else then for the story.

Ah ... "Bioshock" ... le premier opus était déjà une claque à sa sortie, le level design, le script (les dialogue), la musique, etc ..

Certains n'ont pas trop aimé "Bioshock 2", mais moi j'ai bien aimé.

Et "Bioshock Infinite", sur ma config modeste (AMD APU 5350 Quad + 8 GO + SSD + Radeon HD 5750 1 Go + Win 7 Pro 64 bits), c'est beau à tomber par terre en Full HD :-) !

Et  j'ai passé mes premières minutes dessus, juste à observer la cité dans le ciel :-) !

Vraiment les jeux vidéos de nos jours, n'ont rien à envier au cinéma à gros budget !

Je recommade chaudement cette collection en tant que jouer averti 

Et il semblerait qu'il y aie un 4 ème ?

与近几年沙盒自由化的趋势不同，本作是一部纯粹的单线性剧情游戏。
游戏的世界设定很有趣，杂糅蒸汽朋克和美国历史的云中城哥伦比亚，将美国开国总统供奉为神的宗教，以及异化的中国元素（义和团强无敌）等，在此背景下，讲述了一个不太完美但是令人回味的故事。
相比剧情，游戏战斗部分显得有点过时了，操作上中规中矩，随机的套装有些看运气，特质和空轨都不错不过算不上惊喜，裂隙辅助有些让玩家分心。
唯一值得称赞的是游戏女主伊丽莎白，作为一个单机游戏中的非战斗队友，她的表现堪称秒杀同类所有。不需要保护，能开锁，能捡子弹，捡血，捡钱，还能开裂隙......要不是女儿直接要抱回家啊:)
推荐剧情党和喜欢蒸汽朋克的玩家食用。
花了50块钱买的，玩通之后感觉一般。剧情是还可以，但是游戏自由度太低，支线任务也不多，战斗模式也比较简单。总的来说我觉得还是不太好玩。
非常优秀的游戏，遗憾居然最近才玩到。伊丽莎白真是完美的搭档，虽然结尾不是特别喜欢。总之强烈推荐。
wow this got boring fast

Recensione: Bioshock Infinite

Lo descriverò in poche parole. Questo gioco è arte allo stato puro, non sbaglia una virgola, gameplay, trama, grafica, dialoghi, animazioni, sonoro. Tutto è perfetto e rende indimenticabile la nostra permanenza a Columbia.
Fatevelo prestare, compratelo, rubatelo, fate come preferite ma fatevi un regalo e giocate questo capolavoro. Lontano anni luce dai precedenti capitoli li rinnova migliorandoli.

 è il miglior gioco in assoluto al quale ho giocato, sfora qualunque altro metro di giudizio, ben oltre il 10/10 che ho dato a tanti altri capolavori.

Da avere assolutamente.

PS: Scusate la recensione poco recensione e molto sfogo, ma fidatevi, più cose avrete da scoprire a Columbia e meglio sarà. Buona avventura.
This game is proof that good plot devices can be made in video games. Mindblowing!

BioShock is Spectacular! A classic game thats always inviting you in with unique yet eerie enviornment, I honestly couldnt recommend the whole series more. The games story is always fantasic, I replayed the game multiple times and can I still enjoy it! I wish more games were like this; perfect story driven single player game - 10/10

This game is worth every penny you put in it if you are into a story rich games. I ejoyed every minutes I spent in this game. Definitely worth buying.

9/10

Wow...I have now finally finished the Bioshock series, and I can definitely say that this is my favorite of the three. The story is absolutely amazing and had me hooked the entire time! Also, the concept behind the story was just utterly mind blowing...

Additionally, the mechanics are outstanding and I'm going to have to download the DLCS so I can continue playing! I have nothing bad to say about the game except for that I wish it was longer! This game is without a doubt worth every penny.

This game is amazing, I'd highly recommend it and its DLC but 50 is kinda steep for a game thats 4 years old I waited until it was on sale, but I'm just frugal.

This game changed my opinion about singleplayer, heck, games in general. So far I thought the best way to deliver a story is by making a film or book. Turns out I was dead wrong!

By the end I was just sitting there, my mind racing and thinking the story over and over, even now, about a month later it still comes to my mind. 

But it isn't just the story, but the perfect execution of it that makes this game so good, there are passages with some of the best world-building and artwork I've seen in a long time and it doesn't stop there it improves further and further until you're sitting in front of your screen, mouth open and stunned.

The only thing I really couldn't stand about it was the extremely repetive fights. As soon as you enter a new area and you see some salt's around you know the place is going to be shut down and wave after wave is going to enter it. These fights happen all the time and I turned down the difficulty in the end to get past them faster.

But this is no gamebreaker for me, as everything else about Infinite is simply perfect.
